EmailTemplate.name: Approval: Notification of OD Approval for Applications
EmailTemplate.subject: Review Decision Document for {!ReviewStep__c.AnnouncementNumber__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This email is to notify that Office of Grants Management(OGM) has approved the Decision Document associated with the following Funding Opportunity.
Funding Opportunity Number:{!ReviewStep__c.AnnouncementNumber__c} Funding Opportunity Title: {!ReviewStep__c.AnnouncementName__c}. Administration: {!ReviewStep__c.DepartmentName__c}
Please login to EGMS and start the task of type "Decision Document" which is available in Application Pending Tasks in order to provide your Decision.
Sincerely, District of Columbia(DC) - Department of Health(DOH) Enterprise Grants Management System(EGMS)
